PageTitle: display bgp evpn all routing-table statistics
FuncDef: The display bgp evpn all routing-table statistics command displays statistics information about all of BGP EVPN routes. The display bgp evpn all routing-table statistics command displays statistics information about all of BGP EVPN routes. This command is supported only on the CE6863H, CE6863H-K, CE6860-SAN, CE6866K, CE6866, CE6860-HAM, CE6855-48XS8CQ, CE6885-SAN, CE8850-SAN, CE8855, CE8851-32CQ4BQ, CE8851K, CE8851-32CQ8DQ-P, CE8850-HAM, CE6881H, CE6881H-K, CE6820H, CE6820H-K, CE6820S, CE6885, CE6885-T, CE6885-LL (standard forwarding mode) and CE6863E-48S8CQ.
CLIs: display bgp evpn all routing-table statistics

ParaDef.Info:
Displays statistics information about EVPN routes of a specified BGP instance.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported. When double quotation marks are used around the string, spaces are allowed in the string.

Examples: <HUAWEI> display bgp evpn all routing-table statistics
